## Security Improvements This Week

### 1. Log Injection Vulnerabilities Fixed
- **Issue:** User-controlled data in console logs
- **Solution:** Replaced with generic messages
- **Files Fixed:**

  - `scripts/test-pages-http.js`
  - `scripts/check-github-actions.js`
